title: Jesy Nelson Wants to Keep Kids Safe from Social Media
summary: Jesy Nelson is a singer who used to be in a band called Little Mix. She has faced mean comments online, which made her feel sad. Now, she is a mom to twin baby girls named Ocean and Story. Jesy thinks social media can be bad for kids' feelings and health. She wants to stop children under 16 in the UK from using social media to protect them. She says kids should enjoy being kids without worrying about online bullying. Jesy also shares her story in a documentary about her life as a mom. She hopes to keep her daughters safe and happy.
